bot_info.name: Bot Information command
bot_info.un_synchronized: Saved info has some changes need to be updated
bot_info.already_exist: Bot Info already exist and updated

prefix.name: Prefix command
prefix.can_not_remove: **{{-icon}} | **Can not remove prefix `{{-prefix}}`!!! At least one prefix in guild.
prefix.action_description: Please choose action you want to do
prefix.prefix_option: Please input prefix you want to add/remove

help.name: Help command
help.embed_list:
Here is the list of commands of **{{-botName}}**!!! 
 For more info on a specific command, use `{{-prefix}}help {command}`
help.command_option: The command to get help for
help.not_have_permission: **{{-icon}} | {{-username}} | **You do not have permission to use this command!!!

rank.description: Check the server's top rankings for voice or text activity.
rank.timetype_description: Time type: day, week, month, or year (default: month)

rank_history.description: View historical rankings for voice or text activity by week or month.
rank_history.timeout: Selection timed out. Please try again.
rank_history.invalid_year: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, Cannot query data from past years.
rank_history.invalid_month: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, Cannot query data from future months.
rank_history.week_requires_month_and_week: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, Week queries require both month and week number.
rank_history.invalid_week: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, Invalid week number. Maximum weeks in this month: {{maxWeeks}}.
rank_history.no_data: No historical data found for {{type}} rankings in {{period}}.
rank_history.error: {{-icon}} | {{-author}}, An error occurred while fetching historical data: {{error}}

confession.description: Submit an anonymous confession to a server's confession channel
confession.server_id_description: The ID of the server to submit the confession to
confession.attachment_prompt: **{{-icon}} | **Please send up to {{max_attachments}} images as attachments. Click the button below when you're done.
confession.embed_footer: Code by HellCatVN with love for this community
confession.too_many_attachments: **{{-icon}} | **You can only send up to {{max_attachments}} attachments.
confession.slash_attachment_instructions: **{{-icon}} | **Please send your image attachments in the next 30 seconds. The bot will automatically collect them.
confession.timeout: **{{-icon}} | **Attachment collection timed out. Your confession was not submitted.
confession.no_content: **{{-icon}} | **No confession content provided. Please try again.
confession.prefix_not_supported: **{{-icon}} | **{{-author}}, this command only supports slash commands. Please use `/confession` instead.

errors.no_confession_channel: **{{-icon}} | **This server doesn't have a confession channel configured.
